public class RawAccessTest
extends Object

Perform some tests with raw accesses.

open

public static RawAccess open(String fn,
                             int sectorSize,
                             boolean setCacheState)
Opens a raw access according to the parameters.

Parameters:
fn - Name of the RawDevice.
sectorSize - Size of each sector of the RawDevice.
setCacheState - Determines if the cache state has to be set.
Returns:
The RawDevice matching the parameters.

args - Command line options are ignored here.
